TopicTitle: Maneuver planning before ship has left from ground

Articles.Content:
This would help a lot if you could plan your route before you have liftoff.

Example:

-Direct rendevouz with ship at orbit.

-Full scale mission plan to check if your desing is correct for everything at mission.

-If its new vehicle at launch pad, you could save maneuver plan and reload it later for same or totally new vessel. This way you could find your own orbital ascend trajectory and program which you could fine tune and learn.

-You could make maneuver routes for airplanes this way.

Edited September 18, 2023 by Jeq
